mapper.insert: INSERT INTO approval(user_no, date, title, content, category, checker1) VALUES (#{userNo}, curdate(), #{title}, #{content}, #{category}, #{checker1})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM approval a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_no = u.user_no
SELECT * FROM approval a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_no = u.user_no WHERE a.user_no = #{userNo} OR a.checker1 = #{userNo}
SELECT * FROM user u JOIN approval a WHERE a.approval_no = #{approvalNo} AND u.user_no != a.checker1
SELECT * FROM approval a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_no = u.user_no WHERE approval_no = #{approvalNo}
SELECT * FROM approval a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_no = u.user_no WHERE a.user_no = #{userNo}
SELECT * FROM approval a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_no = u.user_no WHERE a.checker1 = #{userNo} OR a.checker2 = #{userNo} OR a.checker3 = #{userNo}
SELECT * FROM approval a, user u WHERE a.user_no = u.user_no AND u.name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
SELECT * FROM approval a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_no = u.user_no WHERE title like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
SELECT * FROM approval a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_no = u.user_no WHERE dept_name like concat('%', #{deptName}, '%')
SELECT * FROM approval a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_no = u.user_no WHERE date = #{date}
SELECT * FROM approval a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_no = u.user_no WHERE check_date = #{checkDate}

SELECT *, (SELECT name FROM user u JOIN approval a WHERE a.approval_no = #{approvalNo} AND u.user_no = a.checker1) as checkerName1 FROM approval a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_no = u.user_no WHERE approval_no = #{approvalNo}
